sentences.en: But the parlous state of the world economy demands nothing less.
sentences.cn: 但是世界经济的危机要求的会更多.

sentences.en: English tennis is in a parlous condition.
sentences.cn: 英国网球运动不堪设想.

sentences.en: Several economists said they doubted the bank could tighten much further, given the parlous economic situation.
sentences.cn: 多为经济学家表示,就现在危机的经济环境而言,对银行进一步紧缩的说法表示怀疑.

sentences.en: The country’s police force was in a parlous state in 1990.
sentences.cn: 1990 年该国的警察部队危机重重。

sentences.en: The parlous state of China's health - care system has also given a powerful boost to religion.
sentences.cn: 危险的中国医疗体系也加速宗教力量的发展.

sentences.en: There have five rooms two parlous and two toilets.
sentences.cn: 在那里有五个房间二危险的和二厕所.

words.tran_cn: 危险的；狡猾的；不易对付的

trans.tran_cn: 危险的，不确定的，难对付的
trans.tran_en: in a very bad or dangerous condition
